Reviews.Content: stayed 10 nights hotel metropole recent visit rome selected hotel close termini rail station cab station catch train florence stay rome settled discovered metropole conveniently located close romes transportation hub meant board 40 express bus start route assured getting seats short supply romes buses couple metro stops colosseum forum hotel metropole return exhausting day serious sightseeing heat king bed comfortable bathroom spacious quiet heard sound heard noise hallway thick door interior hotels air space werent bothered street noise lot rome staff couldnt nicer desk clerk upgrade checked waiters breakfast friendly practically adopted americans standpoint hotels breakfast included excellent cereal choices assortment fresh fruit scrambled eggs bacon sausage pastries hotel caters primarily business people tour metropole trendiest halfway trendy rome neighborhood hotel lively decent affordable restaurants pooped day dinner proved godsend didnt feel close piazza navona trevi fountain via veneto daily sightseeing forays metropole filled bill

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in great location, rooms have seen better days”

Reviews.Content: moved night hotel messed booking prior cruise honeymoon day paid £60 hotel effectively stayed hotel fantastic price reception kindly larger top floor hotel lobby beautiful communal televisions including bracket bathroom seating bed comfortable quiet black blinds curtains electronically slightly temperamental definately seen days style furnishings fashioned tvs run bathroom refurbed hotel recommend hotel price location

Reviews.Content: partner stayed nights star metropole found comforting welcoming clean ready arrival plenty choice breakfast table soon sat tea coffee hotel situated walking distance sites strongly recommend restaurant called thats amore located close hotel via de food goo value

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, good service, location and value”
Reviews.Author: loversoftravel
Reviews.Content: husband returned trip italy spent 3 nights hotel extremely accomodating ready checked reservations restaurants requested email prior arrival helped travel plans clean city standards modern modern bath beautiful marble shower bed comfortable recommend hotel looking hotel location breakfast buffet included excellent american coffee recommend skip expresso cappucino recommended

Reviews.Content: finished 4 night stay star hotel metropole 2 week holiday italy situated 5 minutes termini train station near reasonably priced restaurants expect 40 50 euros 2 course meal nice surprise hotel upgraded junior suite mentioned honeymoon larger sofa floor comfy air con modern facilities breakfast spread eggs bacon pastries easy rome hotel 2 near metro walk sites 30 minutes sites busy advise pre book tickets vatican via own website cheaper tour operators colliseum skip queues summary couldnt fault hotel chose price paying 120 euros night booked 4 months prior looking clean modern hotel fine ps beds comfy tried objective upgrade

Reviews.Title: “Good solid hotel with helpful staff, great breakfast, excellent location”

Reviews.Content: spent weekend boyfriend memorial day hotel outstanding definitely value money rome location helpful staff clean comfortable breakfast wonderful people written location greatclose walk termini near metro bus stops quiet quaint street definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great breakfast, great location, perfect stay!”

Reviews.Content: chose hotel proximity train station train goes directly airport train station transfers 14 euro happy clean nice bathtub pillows rockin breakfast extensive tons fresh fruit pastries eggs sausage bacon yogurt etc definitely recommend drawback internet service wireless 10 euro hour 17 euro 24 hours
